name: entropic
description: A new package registry with a new CLI, designed to be easy to stand up inside your network.
author: C J Silverio <ceejceej@gmail.com>

scripts.lint: npm run lint-registry && npm run lint-cli
scripts.postinstall: for d in cli registry workers; do cd $d; npm i; cd -; done
scripts.test: for d in cli registry; do cd $d; npm t; cd -; done
